title: White Nile
text: The Larsen Design Studio incoporated African motifs and aesthetics in their designs throughout the company's long history. In 1969, Larsen designers created a group of fabrics for Covington Fabrics' <I>Montage Collection<I> that included <I>White Nile<I>, a pattern based on the leaf-shaped motifs often found in Coptic weavings.
description: Lotus pattern on branch inside oval.  Textured. Vert. Rpt 23.75\"; horiz. Rpt. 13.5\". Orange/gold on beige. Gold and Natural
